workPosts.title: This Site
workPosts.body: Not a blog, I'm not a blogger. Just a side project to enjoy music while I code, and also to show things I've worked.

workPosts.title: ZEIT Toast Clone

workPosts.title: Hashing with PBKDF2
workPosts.body: Serverless application to use **[the pbkdf2 algorithm](//en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PBKDF2)** and a sort of playground to hash any text like account safe passwords. My Î» function is **[right here](//github.com/rqbazan/hashing-with-pbkdf2/blob/master/pages/api/index.js)**.

workPosts.title: FeatFlag
workPosts.body: A small and modern React library to use **[the feature toggling principle](//martinfowler.com/articles/feature-toggles.html)**, using the power of contexts. I've used this technical principle for some of my bigger projects.
